bibl.title: Letter from Frederick T. van Beuren, Jr., to Mabel H. Lazear, December 13, 1930

div1.p: Van Beuren thanks Mabel Lazear for trying to find photograph of Lazear.

div1.head: Letter from Frederick T. van Beuren, Jr., to Mabel H. Lazear, December 13, 1930
div1.opener:
OFFICE OF THE DEAN
Columbia University
College of Physicians and Surgeons
630 WEST 166- STREET, NEW YORK
December 13, 1930.
Mrs. Jesse W. Lazear,
6 Oak Vale Avenue,
Berkeley,
California.
My dear Mrs. Lazear:
div1.p:
Thank you very much for your kind letter
of December 5th. It was good of you to make an
effort to try and find a photograph that we might
use. Whether or not we are able to arrange for
a bas-relief portrait, we will have the memorial
tablet with a suitable inscription so that the
name of Jesse W. Lazear may be seen daily by
our students and help to serve as a stimulus to
them for their future work in medicine.

With kindest regards, please believe me to
be,
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Frederick T. van Beuren, Jr., M. D.
Associate Dean. vB/S
